text: Alright, the little girl is reaching up there and she's got her finger to her lips and the boy is on a stool, standing on a stool, but it's going to fall pretty soon. He's reaching for cookies and the mother has her back to him. She doesn't see them, but she hasn't paid any attention to his sink. It's running all over the place. Her window is open and there's a nice garden and a garage out back. She's drying some dishes, she has an apron on, her dress is sleeveless. pretty nice
